label: Description
value: Horizontal view of woman in profile, holding  a fan in her right hand and sitting in a folding chair on a shaded spot of lawn;  tree foliage in background.  She gazes down on a butterfly resting  on the back of her left hand; another butterfly flits above the lawn  near the left edge of picture.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint on canvas

label: Provenance
value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.

label: Description
value: A boy in overalls and a hat leans on a rail fence looking ahead at the viewer against a background of trees, meadow flowers, grasses, and a wheat field.

label: Description
value: Vertical view of a young woman, dressed in blue skirt, yellow jacket, white jabot and black hat, standing under a branch of an apple tree in bloom and smelling a cluster of blossoms. Beyond, to left, another tree in blossom; woods in distance.

value: Brush and oil paint on canvas

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a young woman in white flounce dress standing in center; leaning against a hammock swung from supports beyond the right and left edges of picture; resting her arms on farther edges of hammock and looking down.  A fan hangs from a cord around her right wrist.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a cloudy sky and a beached boat with nets and baskets being removed at right of center; with three men and a horse in left foreground; and chalk cliff and breakwater with beached boats in right background.

value: Lithograph on paper Support: white wove paper laid down on thick wove paper

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of the gorge at Devil's Den, Yellowstone.
Verso, in opposite direrection: View of same gorge.

label: Physical description
value: Recto and verso: Graphite on gray paper.

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of valley above Tower Falls, Yellowstone.
Verso: Horizontal view of falls at middle left among tower like rock formations with mountains in background.

value:
Recto: Vertical view with a mountain river winding from the foreground to a rugged range of mountains in the distance.
Verso: Horizontal sketch of mountain range.

label: Physical description

label: Description
value: Vertical view of jagged rocks in foreground with rushing stream leading back through pines on valley floor to the North Dome of Yellowstone.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and black wash, white gouache, graphite on tan wove paper

label: Description
value: Vertical view of large boulders in foreground with tall pine tree in middle ground followed by mountains leading to large mountain dome in background.

value: Brush and black wash, graphite on tan wove paper

value: Plains with mountain range in the distance.

value: Vertical view of a rocky stream in the foreground bottom, followed by pines in the middle ground, with a snow-covered peak in the background.

West Wall of the Canyon, Yellowstone

label: Description
value:
Recto: Vertical view of west wall of the canyon with stream at center, pine trees and rock formations throughout, seen from the edge of the lower fall.
Verso, in opposite direction:  Slightly sketched view of canyon landscape.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Graphite on paper. Verso: Graphite on paper.

label: Description
value: Vertical view of a forest clearing with sheer outcropping of rock and tall hemlocks.
Cliffs of the Rio Virgin, South Utah

label: Description
value: A line of eroded cliffs rises from a plateau, while a stream traverses the bottom of a deep canyon.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor with white gouache on light-brown wove paper

label: Notes
value: A line of eroded cliffs rises from a plateau, while a stream traverses the bottom of a deep canyon.
Rio Virgin River with Large Rock Formations

label: Description
value: Horizontal view laying out the landscape of a large gully filled with trees and rocks in the foreground followed by a river with sand banks leading to large rock formations in the background.
The Canyon of the Rio Virgin, South Utah

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of rock formations seen across the valley and river.  Some plants are in the foreground. Many notations refer to the colors and to the kinds of formations.

Verso: Slightly sketched view of a mountain lake (?)
Rock Towers in the Muave [Muav] Canyon, Colorado

label: Description
value: Vertical view of canyon shown between two rock towers.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a group of horsemen approaching a waterhole, with a man seated nearby.  Group of trees, at center, in middle distance. Castellated cliffs and hills in  background.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and black wash, white gouache on gray paper

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a large body of water in foreground and mountain ranges in the background.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and watercolor over graphite, ruled in graphite on off-white laid paper
View from Powell's Plateau, Grand Canyon, Colorado

label: Description
value:
Recto: View of the Grand Canyon from the rim of Powell's Plateau, one of the most scenic vistas of the Grand Canyon and Colorado River, named after the explorer and geologist John Wesley Powell, leader of the Colorado River Expedition.
Verso: Barely decipherable landscape (?) in ruled graphite border.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on tan wove paper Verso: Graphite on paper

label: Notes
value: Recto: View of the Grand Canyon from the rim of Powell's Plateau, one of the most scenic vistas of the Grand Canyon and Colorado River, named after the explorer and geologist John Wesley Powell, leader of the Colorado River Expedition.
